jutils

Class FIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • jutils.FIO

  • public class FIO
extends java.lang.Object
    The FIO class brings together some common File functionality including opening, closing reading, and writing to files; with error checking. Also included is the option to "trace" the calls by writing info out to a previously opened "traceFile" (or to StdOut).

    • Constructor Detail

      • FIO

        public FIO(Trace tr)
        File I/O routines

        Working with multiple open files is a pain, this class encompasses most of my file input/output routines with the error handling and trace process of these programs. Current capabilities are:

        • open
        • close
        • readline
        • writeline
        Additional routines may be added in the future.
        Parameters:
        tr - Trace instance for debugging and error messages, if null all messages are sent to System.out.
        Note: When working with the TraceFile, passing a null value makes sure that the methods do not try to write a message to the trace file while managing the trace file!

      • getAllVersions

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllVersions(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> vlist)
        Returns list of mapped pairs of class file names and the version number. It also adds all called routines to the list. If the class file name and version is already in the list, it does not add them, it simply returns.
        Parameters:
        vlist - Map of the current class/versions to be appended to
        Returns:
        Map of the class/version values for this and all called routines
